mapper.select: SELECT sec_to_time(sum(timestampdiff(second,attendance_in,attendance_out)) OVER()) monthWorkHours FROM attendance WHERE year(attendance_date) = year(NOW()) and week(attendance_date) = week(NOW()) AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY attendance_date DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET attendance_out=now() WHERE attendance_date = DATE(NOW()) AND user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE attendance SET attendance_outside=now() WHERE attendance_date = DATE(NOW()) AND user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE attendance SET attendance_inside=now() WHERE attendance_date = DATE(NOW()) AND user_id = #{userId}
